GET /.description: serves a description of all endpoints and associated queries

GET /letter.description: serves a new generated letter using the given query parameters. Requires params are from_name, subject and emotion

query params.to_name: the name of who the letter is to
query params.from_name: the name of who the letter is to
query params.subject: what the letter should be about
query params.emotion: the users feelings towards the subject
